p: On the contrary, the essential oil of Pelargonium graveolens and Cinnamomum verum showed a synergistic effect with the antifungal drug fluconazole against the strain of C. albicans resistant to fluconazole. These combinations could be effective in increasing the efficacy of fluconazole. The synergistic activity of the essential oil of C. verum and P. graveolens with fluconazole could involve multiple sites in Candida cells. P. graveolens is directed to cell wall synthesis by inhibiting fatty acid biosynthesis and improving fluconazole entry into Candida cells that lead to ergosterol inhibition.[ 3]
